member.name: T:Sels.Core.Mediator.Event.EventOptions
member.summary: Exposes extra options when raising events.

member.name: F:Sels.Core.Mediator.Event.EventOptions.None
member.summary: No options selected.

member.name: F:Sels.Core.Mediator.Event.EventOptions.FireAndForget
member.summary: Don't wait for any subscribers to handle the event. Method call will return immediately. Exceptions will be logged. 0 will always be returned.

member.name: F:Sels.Core.Mediator.Event.EventOptions.IgnoreExceptions
member.summary: Exceptions thrown by subscribers will be caught but not rethrown. Exceptions will be logged.

member.name: F:Sels.Core.Mediator.Event.EventOptions.NoTransaction
member.summary: Subscribers that make use of will return immediately instead of waiting for each other.
